premiumAnalytics_windowFirstTitle.message: Show the earliest days within the selected window

premiumAnalytics_errorInactive.message: Premium analytics are available for active Patreon supporters.

premiumTeaser_subtitle.message: Raw dislikes are direct reports from extension users watching this video.

premiumTeaser_statusError.message: We could not load dislike data just now. Try reloading the page.

premiumTeaser_breadcrumbsTitle.message: Unlock Premium Video Insights in three quick steps:

premiumTeaser_breadcrumbStep1.message: Sign in with Patreon from the Return YouTube Dislike extension popup.

premiumTeaser_breadcrumbStep2.message: Select the Premium tier to enable activity timelines, country leaderboards, and the interactive map.

premiumTeaser_breadcrumbStep3.message: Reload YouTube to view hourly trends, top countries, and US state drill-downs for every video.

premiumTierNotice_message.message: Your Patreon membership doesn't include the Premium tier. Upgrade your pledge to unlock advanced video analytics.

changelog_subheading.message: Explore the live activity timeline, top countries leaderboard, and interactive map included with Return YouTube Dislike Premium.

changelog_feature_timeline_body.message: Watch likes and dislikes stream in real time. Toggle hourly, daily, or all-time presets without reloading, anchor the window to day one or the latest votes, and scrub every spike to see what triggered engagement.

changelog_feature_map_body.message: Pan across the globe or dive into US states to surface hotspots. Compare likes, dislikes, and ratios in the upgraded tooltip and spotlight the regions that react first to your uploads.

changelog_feature_quality_body.message: Rank every country by raw activity, likes, dislikes, or ratio. Filter with the same presets as the timeline to learn where campaigns land and plan what to publish next.

changelog_screenshot_placeholder.message: Screenshot coming soon—capture this view in DevTools when ready.

changelog_upgrade_body.message: Ready to dive in? Follow these quick steps and refresh your YouTube tab.

changelog_upgrade_step1.message: Open the Return YouTube Dislike popup and sign in with Patreon.

changelog_upgrade_step2.message: Choose the Premium tier to enable analytics data streaming to your account.

changelog_upgrade_step3.message: Reload any YouTube watch page—your timeline, map, and leaderboards appear instantly.

changelog_release_item1.message: Activity timeline presets stream live data with range anchors for first and latest buckets.

changelog_release_item2.message: Country leaderboard refreshes instantly so you can spot rising regions without leaving the panel.

changelog_release_item3.message: Interactive map highlights global and US state hotspots with clearer tooltips and metrics.

changelog_support_description.message: We’re here if you hit a snag—bring your questions to the support docs or community.
